Text: Thanks so much for this I really appreciate it! I need it for a  deserving non-profit site.  Have been looking for days and kep getting ones I can't install. One question please..how to install?  I have the double zipped files but  don't know what to install first there seem to be a lot of files. thanks
If anyone has installed this package and knows how, please  help me, thannks

Hi,

I purchased this software for Joomla. Installation exactly the same withother plug in installations. After install go to plug ins and enable fpss. You can find some help from joomlaworks's web site.
